ygData.subject: Re: Research Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: How bizarre. my int is 142 and my wisdom is around 80. I m level 18. ... From: Tim Borelli [mailto:timb@volition-inc.com] Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 3:12 PM
ygData.messageBody:
How bizarre.
my int is 142 and my wisdom is around 80.

I'm level 18.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Borelli [mailto:timb@...]
Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 3:12 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Research Skill


From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>

my skill went from 17 to 18 to 19 in three tries.

my int is 98, my wis is 83.

level 19. just started researching today, and went up.

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 19th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 03:12 PM 5/24/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>really? 5 successes and 4 failures and no skill point for me...What did it
>say that your skill were? What's your level?
>
